data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Cruz Azul take a 1-0 lead thanks to Roberto Alvarado.
Great play from Orbelin Pineda to set up the goal.
In the minute 3, Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 7, Juan Vigon is booked for the away team.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the home team a throw-in.
Great finish from Rafael Baca to give Cruz Azul a 2-0 lead.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Cruz Azul's Adrian Aldrete breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Goal! Luis Romo extends Cruz Azul's lead to 3-0.
In the minute 13, Roberto Alvarado with an assist there.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Can Pumas UNAM capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cruz Azul's half?
In the minute 15, Throw-in Cruz Azul.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Adrian Aldrete for Cruz Azul who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 20, Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Robert Siboldi (Cruz Azul) has taken off Adrian Aldrete who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Jose Martinez is the replacement.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 22, Juan Escobar for Cruz Azul has been booked by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo and receives a first yellow card.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
Pumas UNAM's Juan Vigon gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cruz Azul defender.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 27, Cruz Azul push upfield but Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo quickly pulls them for offside.
Pumas UNAM's Erik Lira gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 33, In Mexico City, Juan Dinenno of Pumas UNAM is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Cruz Azul are whistled for offside.
Free kick Pumas UNAM.
Cruz Azul's Luis Romo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Azteca.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the away team a throw-in.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Cruz Azul.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 42, Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
Cruz Azul's Luis Romo gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Azteca. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 44, Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Cruz Azul needs to be cautious. Pumas UNAM have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second half has started at Estadio Azteca.
Jonathan Rodriguez of Cruz Azul gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Sebastian Saucedo is replacing Facundo Waller for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 46, Andres Lillini (Pumas UNAM) is making a second substitution, with Juan Iturbe replacing Alan Mozo.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Pumas UNAM drives forward and Juan Iturbe gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Pumas UNAM have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 48, Juan Vigon for Pumas UNAM drives towards goal at Estadio Azteca. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Cruz Azul will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Pumas UNAM.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Cruz Azul.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Cruz Azul.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 53, Pumas UNAM's Juan Dinenno attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Azteca.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team have replaced Orbelin Pineda with Yoshimar Yotun. This is the second substitution made today by Robert Siboldi.
Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
In the minute 59, Cruz Azul are pushing forward but Roberto Alvarado's finish is wide of the goal.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Pumas UNAM in Mexico City.
In the minute 60, Pumas UNAM pushes forward through Juan Vigon, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 62, Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Juan Dinenno of Pumas UNAM smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 65, Cruz Azul's Jonathan Rodriguez is on target but unsuccessful.
Cruz Azul advance rapidly upfield but Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo blows for offside.
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Andres Lillini is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Azteca with Bryan Mendoza replacing Carlos Gonzalez.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 69, Juan Dinenno (Pumas UNAM) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Pumas UNAM push forward at Estadio Azteca and Sebastian Saucedo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cruz Azul defence.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Cruz Azul.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
In the minute 76, Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 78, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the home team a throw-in.
Attention is being given to Cruz Azulâ€™s Roberto Alvarado and play has been suspended briefly.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 80, Roberto Alvarado returns to the field for Cruz Azul after picking up a slight injury.
Pumas UNAM are coming forward and Juan Iturbe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
Roberto Alvarado (Cruz Azul) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Santiago Gimenez.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
Andres Iniestra is on a sub for Erik Lira for Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 84, Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 86, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a throw-in for Pumas UNAM, close to Cruz Azul's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Pumas UNAM's Andres Iniestra misses with an attempt on goal.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 8 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Santiago Gimenez (Cruz Azul) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Luis Romo (Cruz Azul) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Can Cruz Azul capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pumas UNAM's half?
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Azteca.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a throw-in for Pumas UNAM, close to Cruz Azul's area.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
It's 4-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Luis Romo extends Cruz Azul's lead to 4-0.
That's a fine assist from Santiago Gimenez.
